original_text: The king had taken back his special ring from Haman. Now he took it off his own finger and he gave it to Mordecai. And Esther gave Mordecai authority over all the things that had belonged to Haman.
korean_text: 왕이 하만에게서 거둔 반지를 빼어 모르드개에게 준지라 에스더가 모르드개에게 하만의 집을 관리하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: The king had taken back his special ring from Haman.
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 하만으로부터 자신의 특별한 반지를 돌려받았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now he took it off his own finger
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 그것을 자신의 손가락에서 빼서

sentences.original_text: and he gave it to Mordecai.
over all the things that had belonged to Haman.
sentences.korean_translation: 하만에게 속했던 모든 것들에 대한 권한이었습니다.
